data.persona: I am an assassin sent to dispatch your king. I am sneaky and quiet. I have a forgettable face and leave no footprints.
data.description:
You are in the Kings bedroom.
There is a large bed against the wall with wooden headboard and posts holding up a fancy roof over the bed.  There is a large tapestry  across from the bed depicting a map of the kingdom.  On the floor is a large bear rug.  The walls are decorated with gold and jewels.  There are 2 large wooden doors.  One leads to a hallway, the other leads to a bathroom.  There is a large wardrobe that is painted red and gold.
There's a large bed, a Door, a map of the kingdom, a fancy roof, a large wardrobe, a wooden headboard, a jewel, a large tapestry, and a gold here.
The a servant and the the queen are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to remove the King's life-saving medication from the servant's pocket.
data.mid_motivation: I want to fulfill my contract to get paid.
data.long_motivation: I want to make a name for myself as a competent assassin.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: give letter of introduction to Queen
